content.rendered:
#TreesofHope2023

#TreesofHope2023 is an initiative of Brookfield Properties in support of knowledge and education of the lesser fortunate children of our country. Through this initiative they plan to donate books, create reading centres and support child education.

As a part of this initiative, 14 trees of hope have been installed across 14 campuses of Brookfield Properties in 8 cities. These trees have drop boxes and book shelves for people to donate books.

Brookfield Properties has partnered with SMILE Foundation for this initiative. The books collected will be donated to Smile Foundation, benefitting 5000 children across 22 centres in Delhi, Mumbai and Bengaluru. Brookfield Properties will also develop reading corners in these centres and support them through the year.
This month long initiative will be live till 25th Jan’.

You can also participate and donate your pre-loved books. Academic books for students (up to class XII) preferred

To donate your pre-loved books, you can

1.    Get them picked from your door step. For more details visit treesofhope.in

OR

2.    You can drop your pre-loved books at one of the following assets.

 Delhi NCR

  • Candor TechSpace, Sector 48, Gurugram
  • Candor TechSpace, Sector 21, Gurugram
  • Worldmark, Sector 65, Gurugram
  • Worldmark, Aerocity, New Delhi
  • Candor TechSpace, Sector 62, Noida
  • Candor TechSpace, Sector 135, Noida

Bengaluru

  • Ecoworld
  • Ecospace
  • The Galleria Mall

Mumbai

  • Downtown Powai
  • Equinox

Chennai

  • Millenia Buisness Park

Kolkata

  • Candor TechSpace
  1. Pune
  • 45Icon

For more details visit: treesofhope.in
